snippet.title: HROT - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
HROT is a single-player retro FPS set in a small socialist country neighboring Soviet Union (Czechoslovakia) after an unspecified disaster in 1986. Those times were terifying and so is the game. Wishlist on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/824600

For more info follow @kotolout on Twitter.
